channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Short URL
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Short URL

item.title: CVE-2023-3130|2024-10-21T14:35:30.997Z -- unknown -- short%20url
item.description: The Short URL WordPress plugin before 1.6.5 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
